Articles.Content:
Welcome to my little Sci Fi ship testing lot! Here I'll upload details and pics of the progress with my Sci Fi ships.

Notice: I say 'Sci Fi' for the literal reason; they're proper Sci Fi ships, except no interstellar drive yet.

-----Test 1-----

<a href="http://imgur.com/t2NAj"><img src="http://i.imgur.com/t2NAj.png" title="Hosted by imgur.com" alt="" /></a>

<a href="http://imgur.com/zBP7r"><img src="http://i.imgur.com/zBP7r.png" title="Hosted by imgur.com" alt="" /></a>

Details:

Class - Heavy Corvette.

Role - First flight test.

Role achieved - Yes.

Status - Awaiting refits.

-----Test 2-----

<a href="http://imgur.com/CPEGv"><img src="http://i.imgur.com/CPEGv.png" title="Hosted by imgur.com" alt="" /></a>

<a href="http://imgur.com/jCkxN"><img src="http://i.imgur.com/jCkxN.png" title="Hosted by imgur.com" alt="" /></a>

Details:

Class - Heavy Corvette.

Role - Mun flight test.

Role achieved - Yes.

Status - Awaiting refits.

-----Test 3-----

<a href="http://imgur.com/M1r1r"><img src="http://i.imgur.com/M1r1r.png" title="Hosted by imgur.com" alt="" /></a>

<a href="http://imgur.com/g6NSb"><img src="http://i.imgur.com/g6NSb.png" title="Hosted by imgur.com" alt="" /></a>

Details:

Class - Interceptor.

Role - Take off short after rest, no requirement for anti Grav generator, and high speeds.

Role achieved - Yes.

Status - Demanding its beam weapon back.

-----Test 5-----

<a href="http://imgur.com/Vx7vP"><img src="http://i.imgur.com/Vx7vP.png" title="Hosted by imgur.com" alt="" /></a>

<a href="http://imgur.com/Uxejk"><img src="http://i.imgur.com/Uxejk.png" title="Hosted by imgur.com" alt="" /></a>

Details:

Class - Light Frigate.

Role - Warship.

Role achieved - (HurrDurr) Yes.

Status - Awaiting refits to allow proper landing.

-----Test 6-----

<a href="http://imgur.com/QjKEd"><img src="http://i.imgur.com/QjKEd.png" title="Hosted by imgur.com" alt="" /></a>

<a href="http://imgur.com/yd5qQ"><img src="http://i.imgur.com/yd5qQ.png" title="Hosted by imgur.com" alt="" /></a>

<a href="http://imgur.com/nxj0L"><img src="http://i.imgur.com/nxj0L.jpg" title="Hosted by imgur.com" alt="" /></a>

Details:

Class - Corvette.

Role - Multi-purpose.

Role achieved - Not yet; further testing and modifications to be done.

Status - Upset about crashing into Jool's moon Vall.

Additional details (Because it's that epic.) - First non-fighter ship to deny usage of Anti Gravity generator and first ship to reach another planet (Alive upon arrival, but crashed into a lollipop as landed).

-----Videos of ships doing stuff-----

Test 1,2&3 - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8A-_aXwT0dY&feature=plcp

Test 5 - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GpSepF5o4d4&feature=plcp

-----Notices-----

Test 6's planned video is to reach another planet. Originally planned for Jool, but crashed into a blood sucking lollipop on Vall.

Test 4 is too laggy to have its own video, so it was featured in Test 5's video as a target.

-----Mods used-----

Anti Gravity Mod.

SUNBEAM Laser.

C7 Parts.

Cart plugin.

Kerpollo's ladders and landing legs.

(Soon to figure out how to use.) Warp Docking Clamp mod.

NovaPunch pack.

TiberDyne's parts.

(Although I'm going to upload the necessary parts and plugins with the .craft files when they're good to go, so you don't need to worry about it. )

More ships yet to be made.

I'm also looking for people to work with me on developing Sci Fi stuff. (It's probably gonna be a while before I make stuff, like a space station, moon base, etc. Let alone a ship line featuring different build structures. Anyone up for that?)

(On a side note, danke to the nice people for sorting out the image issue. =D)

Edited October 15, 2012 by Krinkut

Hi Krinkut,

The links you posted for your images seem to point to local locations on your hard drive, as opposed to a location on the Internet. Try using a service such as Imgur to upload and host the images.
... Derp. Annnd the pictures are hiding.

Hehe, the pics aren't hiding Krinkut, you can't link from your desktop this way, you need to either host your pics on a site like Imgur and post the links here, or add the pics as attachments once you are a Bottle Rocketeer, after your 6th post
Is there a .craft file for the Mun ready Corvette?

I see you're getting used to foruming, Krinkut! (wish that was a word :/)

Anyhow, I'd suggest using [ img][/img ] tags instead. Makes the images show up rather than the url, which makes for a nicer experience! Imgur is also nice in that it will give you these codes if you click on the image in your account's home screen!

Also, using the [ spoiler=Spoiler Title][/spoiler ] tags makes it so you can hide away those images to shorten the post overall!

Welcome to my little Sci Fi ship testing lot! Here I'll upload details and pics of the progress with my Sci Fi ships.

Notice: I say 'Sci Fi' for the literal reason; they're proper Sci Fi ships, except no interstellar drive yet.

-----Test 1-----

Details:

Class - Heavy Corvette.

Role - First flight test.

Role achieved - Yes.

Status - Awaiting refits.

By the way, I love the look of your ships. I must ask though, how are you getting them to float? Is it a certain mod like the antigravity mod?
I'd suggest letting people see the .craft(s), and letting us know what mods you used.

I'd suggest letting people see the .craft(s), and letting us know what mods you used.

Yes, since well, the spacecraft exchange is about... exchanging spacecraft.. heh.
When I refit Test 1,2,3 and 5, I'm gonna upload their .craft files along with the modified parts I used.

I see you're getting used to foruming, Krinkut! (wish that was a word :/)

Anyhow, I'd suggest using [ img][/img ] tags instead. Makes the images show up rather than the url, which makes for a nicer experience! Imgur is also nice in that it will give you these codes if you click on the image in your account's home screen!

Also, using the [ spoiler=Spoiler Title][/spoiler ] tags makes it so you can hide away those images to shorten the post overall!

By the way, I love the look of your ships. I must ask though, how are you getting them to float? Is it a certain mod like the antigravity mod?

When I try the [ IMG][/img ] it comes up as a tiny loading picture. Should I let it load? =o

And yes, all the ships use the Anti Gravity Mod. Test 6 is starting its design off with modified C7 parts, and with further testing I hope that the only modification I'll ever need to do is to just remove fuel consumption.

Never mind. Danke nice person. <()>
